mapper.select: SELECT MEETER_BOARD_NO, WRITER, TITLE, CONTENTS, BOARD_WRITE_DATE, BOARD_MODIFY_DATE, TOTAL_MEMBER, CURRENT_MEMBER, MEETING_PLACE, MEETING_DATE, METTING_PURPOSE, LIMIT_AREA, LIMIT_AGE, LIMIT_GENDER FROM MEETER_BOARD WHERE MEETER_BOARD_DELFLAG = 'N' ORDER BY MEETER_BOARD_NO DESC

SELECT MEETER_BOARD_NO, WRITER, TITLE, CONTENTS, BOARD_WRITE_DATE, BOARD_MODIFY_DATE, TOTAL_MEMBER, CURRENT_MEMBER, MEETING_PLACE, MEETING_DATE, METTING_PURPOSE, LIMIT_AREA, LIMIT_AGE, LIMIT_GENDER FROM MEETER_BOARD WHERE MEETER_BOARD_DELFLAG = 'N' ORDER BY MEETER_BOARD_NO DESC LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 No, MEETER_BOARD_NO, MEETER_BOARD_DELFLAG FROM MEETER_BOARD, (SELECT @rownum:=0) r WHERE MEETER_BOARD_DELFLAG = 'N'

SELECT MEETER_BOARD_NO, WRITER, TITLE, CONTENTS, BOARD_WRITE_DATE, BOARD_MODIFY_DATE, TOTAL_MEMBER, CURRENT_MEMBER, MEETING_PLACE, MEETING_DATE, METTING_PURPOSE, LIMIT_AREA, LIMIT_AGE, LIMIT_GENDER , MEETER_BOARD_DELFLAG FROM MEETER_BOARD, (SELECT @rownum:=0) r WHERE MEETER_BOARD_DELFLAG = 'N' AND MEETER_BOARD_NO = 35;
